onboarding_chip_description.message: Chip Sparalarm works with the highest standards regarding data protection (without user profiling or collection of any PII). With Sparalarm, you as a user are always anonymous.

onboarding_chip_description_more.message:
The technology behind Sparalarm works solely on the user’s device. Among other things, it analyzes which websites the user visits and what the user has searched previously for on the Internet. This provides the basis for determining potential purchase intent.

Sparalarm doesn’t send any information whatsoever to a server that identifies individual users. Instead, it sends out only anonymous and purely statistical data. More details can be found under: https://sparalarm.chip.de/datenschutzerklaerung/.

onboarding_chip_settings_header.message: You can change these settings anytime in the Add-on.

onboarding_chip_subtitle.message:
Thank you for downloading the
Chip Sparalarm Browser Add-on

onboarding_cliqz_description.message: Ce module complémentaire vous offre des fonctionnalités pratiques chaque fois que vous ouvrez un nouvel onglet: accés rapide à vos sites web favoris, les actualités internationales, nouveaux fonds d'écran, un moteur de recherche anonyme et des offres intéressantes.

onboarding_cliqz_description_more.message: Cliqz tab n’envoie aucune information permettant d'identifier un utilisateur. Seules des données statistiques et anonymes sont envoyées. Pour en savoir plus, veuillez vous référer à la page suivante: https://cliqz.com/privacy-browser.

onboarding_cliqz_settings_header.message: Vous pouvez changer ces paramètres à tout moment dans les add-ons.

onboarding_cliqz_subtitle.message:
Merci d’avoir téléchargé
Cliqz Tab pour Firefox !

onboarding_myoffrz_description.message: MyOffrz works with the highest standards regarding data protection (without user profiling or collection of any PII). With MyOffrz, you as a user are always anonymous.

onboarding_myoffrz_description_more.message:
The technology behind MyOffrz works solely on the user’s device. Among other things, it analyzes which websites the user visits and what the user has searched previously for on the Internet. This provides the basis for determining potential purchase intent.

MyOffrz doesn’t send any information whatsoever to a server that identifies individual users. Instead, it sends out only anonymous and purely statistical data. More details can be found under: https://myoffrz.com/datenschutzerklaerung/ .

onboarding_myoffrz_settings_header.message: You can change these settings anytime in the Add-on.

onboarding_myoffrz_subtitle.message:
Thank you for downloading the
MyOffrz Browser Add-on
